nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_676
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: An interesting question therefore remains as to how far Microsoft can go with Gates as its CEO.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_677
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: There's/It's no use complaining since nothing ever changes as the result of a complaint. What's important is to take measures to prevent similar events from happening.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_678
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Learn to accept the fact that some people you thought were friends turn out to be enemies.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_679
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: As you would expect from the book's title, there are many references to what kind of man Gates is.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_680
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The prosperity of the company stems from hardworking and thrifty of the entire staff.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_681
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He said nothing at all on the subject of the play which was put on for the first time Saturday night.
